allow:
Bash(python -c "
from app.services.llm_client import get_llm_client

print(''''Testing OpenRouter with DeepSeek R1...'''')
print(''''=''''*60)

client = get_llm_client()
print(f''''Client type: {type(client).__name__}'''')

if hasattr(client, ''''model''''):
    print(f''''Model: {client.model}'''')
if hasattr(client, ''''base_url''''):
    print(f''''Base URL: {client.base_url}'''')

print(f''''Is available: {client.is_available()}'''')

if client.is_available():
    print()
    print(''''Testing simple generation...'''')
    result = client.generate(''''Say hello in one sentence.'''')
    print(f''''Response: {result}'''')
    print()
    print(''''[OK] OpenRouter connection successful!'''')
else:
    print()
    print(''''[FAIL] OpenRouter not available'''')
")
